General.Name: Xinyaqiang Silicon Chemistry Co Ltd
General.Description: Xinyaqiang Silicon Chemistry Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells organic silicon methylsilane and phenyl products. It offers Hexamethyldisilazane, Hexamethyldisiloxane, Iodotrimethylsilane, Dimethyldiethoxylsilane, Trimethylchlorosilane, Sodiumhexamethyldisilazane, Hexamethyldisilane, Hexamethyldisilylurea, Tetramethyldivinyldisiloxane, Dimethylvinylchlorosilane, Vinyltrimethylsilane, Tetramethyldivinyldisilazane, Dimethylvinylethoxysilane, Dichloromethylvinylsilane, Phenyltrichlorosilane, Phenyltrimethoxysilane, Diphenyldimethoxysilane, Diphenylsilanediol, Diphenyldichlorosilane,Phenyltriethoxysilane, Diphenyldiethoxysilane, and other products. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Suqian, China.
